name: Mental Health Europe - Santé Mentale Europe
goal:
Mental Health Europe envisions a Europe where people with mental health problems live as full citizens with access to appropriate services and support, where positive mental health and well- being are given high priority in the political spectrum and on the European health and social agenda, where people with mental health problems live as full citizens with access to appropriate services and support, and where meaningful participation is guaranteed at all levels of decision-making

MHE’s mission is upholding the mental health and well-being of all citizens, from all minority groups and from the whole of Europe.

Our work is shaped by our core values, which we uphold through all our activities:
Independence
Human rights
Transparency
Self-determination
Recovery
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Social Pillar
